content:
Quite a few of my recent CI runs have failed with "PANIC index out of bounds". I don't know if it's the actual material in the commits (I've been trying to bisect to no avail), some git magic above my usual paygrade which I attempted, or a random fluke. Has anyone seen this before?

If someone is willing to investigate, you can compare
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/compare/rel_congr2 (builds ok)
with
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/compare/rel_congr_golfs2 (5 commits later most of which are attempts to circumvent the panicking)

Heather Macbeth said:

I don't know if it's the actual material in the commits (I've been trying to bisect to no avail)

My current experiments suggest it's indeed the actual material in the commits, so maybe no need for help just now.
Heather Macbeth has marked this topic as resolved.
